_header: Til his disciples said Jesus / As Luke the gospeller tells us
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 3299.
_description: Gospel for Second Sunday after Trinity, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO his disciples seide IhesusAs seint Luc telleþ
                    vs…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…As of þe fulþe of lecheryAs here a take
                    scheweþ openly

BodAsh42.First Lines:
To his dissiples saide iesusAls luke þe gospellere tellis
                    vs…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Als duse of some synne of lyccherieAls in a tale writen find
                    I

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
To his dissiples said ihesuAls luke þe gospeller tellis
                    vs…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Als dose of filth of lichoryAls in a tale written fynde
                    I

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Tyll Hys discipiles sayde ihesusas oure gospell now tellys vsA
                    man he sayde made a gret soper…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…And þam to halde fra synne dedeAnd vs & þam fra
                    hell lede
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica secunda post festum sancte trinitatis Secundum Lucam (f.
                        103v)

HunHM129.First Lines:
To his disciplis said ihesusAs Luc þe gospeller saith
                    vs…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…As of þe syn and filth of lecheryAs þis tale
                    schowyth oppynly
